whyChooseUs.onTimeDesc: We pride ourselves on completing projects within scheduled timelines without compromising quality.
whyChooseUs.certifiedDesc: All our workforce is professionally trained, certified, and experienced in their respective fields.
whyChooseUs.costEffectiveDesc: Competitive pricing with transparent billing and no hidden costs for all our services.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and operations
faq.a1: HBR-WORLD offers comprehensive contracting services including civil construction, interior/exterior fit-out, MEP works (electrical, plumbing, mechanical, HVAC), facility maintenance, renovation works, and professional manpower supply across Saudi Arabia.
faq.q2: Which areas in Saudi Arabia do you operate?
faq.a2: We operate across all major cities in Saudi Arabia including Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, Makkah, Madinah, and other key industrial and commercial zones throughout the Kingdom.
faq.q3: What types of manpower can you supply?
faq.a3: We provide skilled workers, semi-skilled workers, general laborers, engineers, technicians, drivers, welders, operators, safety officers, and specialized construction personnel. All our workers are properly trained and certified.
faq.q4: How do you ensure quality and safety on projects?
faq.a4: We maintain strict HSE protocols, adhere to international safety standards, conduct regular quality audits, and ensure all team members are properly trained and certified. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our ISO certifications.
faq.q5: What is your project timeline guarantee?
faq.a5: We pride ourselves on on-time delivery. Each project receives a detailed timeline during the planning phase, and we maintain transparent communication throughout to ensure milestones are met as scheduled.
faq.q6: How can I get a quote for my project?
faq.a6: You can request a quote by visiting our Contact page, calling our office directly, or sending an email to info@hbr-world.com. Our team will assess your requirements and provide a competitive, transparent quotation within 48 hours.

about.title: Building
about.intro: HBR-WORLD is a leading contracting and manpower supply company, delivering world-class solutions across Saudi Arabia.
about.story1: Founded in 2009, HBR-WORLD has grown from a small contracting firm to become one of Saudi Arabia's most trusted names in construction and manpower supply.
about.story2: Our journey began with a simple vision: to deliver excellence in every project we undertake. Today, with over 15 years of experience, we've successfully completed 850+ projects and deployed more than 12,000 skilled professionals across the Kingdom.
about.story3: We take pride in our ability to understand client needs, deliver on-time results, and maintain the highest standards of quality and safety in all our operations.
about.visionText: To be the most trusted and preferred contracting and manpower solutions partner in the Middle East, recognized for innovation, quality, and reliability in every project we undertake.
about.missionText: To deliver exceptional construction and manpower services that exceed client expectations, while maintaining the highest standards of safety, quality, and professionalism in all our operations.
about.integrityDesc: Honest and transparent in all dealings
